allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add development journal hook for action tracking

- Create journal-action.sh hook to track key dev actions
- Configure PostToolUse hooks for Write, Edit, Bash, Task tools
- Add DEV_JOURNAL.md for auto-generated activity log
- Update CLAUDE.md to document the journal system

This enables Claude Code Cloud to track development context.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add XcodeGen project configuration for app build

- Add project.yml for XcodeGen project generation
- Add Info.plist with app configuration and privacy descriptions
- Remove duplicate HCDInterviewCoachApp.swift entry point
- Rename duplicate ExportService to PostSessionExportService
- Fix return statement in AIReflectionView Preview
- Update deployment target to macOS 14.0 for SwiftData

Note: Build has duplicate type definitions to resolve in next pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
